text: You can emphasize what modules work best with a package of templates using <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/themes#theme-modules>
there is no way to currently hide the common modules
I was trying to dynamically assign labels at the template label, but after some research i learned it is not possible with HubSpot
Hello, many thanks for your anwser. I will have a look at HubSpot CMS themes.
